faqs.question: Tell me a little about your rider safety initiative
faqs.answer: Our model and store mapping ensure that our rider partners operate within a smaller 3 km radius around the same dark store, building greater familiarity, safety, and comfort for our Okal Rider Partners as well as the communities.

faqs.question: Rider feedback in general
faqs.answer: We love to hear from you! Please reach out to us and we will get back to you shortly.

faqs.question: Have a non-urgent question or comment?
faqs.answer: You can email us at support@okalnow.com and our team will respond soon.

faqs.question: Any feedback or review
faqs.answer: We love to hear from you! Please reach out to us and we will get back to you shortly.

faqs.question: Out of stock
faqs.answer: We try to replenish all out-of-stock items regularly. However, if a product is unavailable, you can click the 'Notify Me' button and we’ll send you a notification once it’s back in stock.

faqs.question: Packaging feedback
faqs.answer: We love to hear from you! Please reach out to us with your packaging feedback and we’ll get back to you shortly.
